channel.title: How could i change prices for shop items? (Read more)
channel.description: i know how to change prices but i click value on item and it shows me lik 10million for example. then i go and look in that section for item and i only see like 43024 numbers. how do i know which is which price?

item.title: How could i change prices for shop items? (Read more)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

If you look inside the shop class you can see how it loads each variable, From what I remember the shop configuration consists of tabs and contains 3 values for price. These would be the shop price, low alch price, and high alch price. I think it was the first 3, Just look for whip and compare it to the online price and alch values and you have which ones to change.

Read full topic
item.source: How could i change prices for shop items? (Read more)
